content.description: Make moves up pitches and the arete until you can move right to a pocket and up on crimps. The start hold on this problem is getting very greasy and presents a real problem when you are standing on it as your feet need to stay to hold the terribly sloping hands.
content.location: Right in front of you when you enter the Beehive

content.description: warm up, start on chalked crimps go straight up
content.location: walk past uncut yogi first chalked line to your left after passing through alcove

content.description: Sit start with low crimps right of the white section of rock. Go to a left-facing flake and then continue up.
content.location: This is on the Strange brew boulder that is just past Uncut Yogi. It is on the same face as Strange Brew V1, and is to the right of Eh V0+

content.description: on the humidifier boulder, dinky warm up
content.location: farthest left line if facing the wall, walk through alcove from uncut yogi walk around as far as you can on the boulder to your right side

content.description: start on crimps at about shoulder height, biggish move to large hueco up and right
content.location: back side of humidifier, look for two chalked up crimps and basketball sized hueco near the lip
climb directly in front of the tree on humidifier boulder

content.description: Stem and/or pull inside of a huge hourglass shaped hueco to the lip, then make a tricky mantel over the top.
content.protection: Pads and spotters, the landing is a bit iffy.

content.description: Climb begins on low edges on right hand boulder. Make a few moves up until you can transition out on to the boulder to your left using a small hueco and horizontal crack. Get established and climb straight up and to the right on the excellent iron rock face.
content.location: Uphill from Uncut Yogi and Hourglass in corridors. A skull marks the spot.Â

content.description: start low on left hand crimp right hand slpoer gaston cross to right hand crimp and up, v0/1 starting one move in
content.location: chalked line to the right of strange brew on same face

content.description: Nice warm area with morning sun. Many moderate problems make this a good place to warm up, and the classic Uncut Yogi is here.
